ruleEngine.rules.atomicRules

Class CheckPlayerMovesLeft

  • java.lang.Object
    • ruleEngine.rules.atomicRules.CheckPlayerMovesLeft
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IRule

    public class CheckPlayerMovesLeft
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRule
    Check if the player performing the action has at least one move remaining for this turn.
    Valid if there is at least one move left, invalid otherwise.
    See Also:
    MoveRules
